summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4296 for the improvement of the alley in Block 25, J. J. McGilvra's 3rd Supplemental Addition, and Block 35, Loch Gilvra Addition, being the alley between 42nd Avenue North and 43rd Avenue North, from East Lynn Street to East Newton Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 51032, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
